columns.name: ConfigurationId
columns.description: Unique identifier for a specific configuration

columns.name: ConfigurationImpact
columns.description: Rated impact of the configuration to the overall configuration score (1-10)

columns.name: ConfigurationCategory
columns.description: Category or grouping to which the configuration belongs: Application, OS, Network, Accounts, Security controls

columns.name: ConfigurationSubcategory
columns.description: Subcategory or subgrouping to which the configuration belongs. In many cases, this describes specific capabilities or features.

columns.name: ConfigurationBenchmarks
columns.description: List of industry benchmarks recommending the same or similar configuration

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Labels representing various attributes used to identify or categorize a security configuration

columns.name: RemediationOptions
columns.description: Recommended actions to reduce or address any associated risks
